summary: Communicated fundamental programming concepts using Python to undergraduate students
Completed over 250 capture-the-flag challenges and 48 online modules to further cybersecurity knowledge
Implemented 3+ wrapper scripts in Python and Bash replacing manual processes
Developed 2 new functionalities and pages in PHP to simplify user permission edits for practice consultants
Assisted in development of software startup by developing image analytics software using OpenCV to increase efficiency of workload for pathologists
